results.content:
Excellent cours, instructeur très pédagogue et beaucoup d'éléments de base, qui seront pour la plupart inutiles, mais qui rende ce cours accessible au plus grand nombre.

En quelques heures un très bon système d'authentification.
Donne de très bonnes bases pour se lancer dans la suite.
En un mot Excellent !
Merci !

results.content:
In the context of this course, the approach to validating forms is completely new to me, and I must admit that I learned a great deal from it. Despite language barrier, and the fact background information is lacking, I still think that the instructor, Usman,  makes the course engaging by staying on the task at hand. I watched the videos for the entire course in one sitting. I have been working on a personal project for sometime now, and I' m stuck on validating responses from a form using php. This course has clarified things for me. One thing I didn't like though is that Usman keeps telling his students to take things they don't get on faith instead of recommending sources for them to read further about their point of confusion.  That said, I still think that there's a lot things to learn from this course, and I strongly recommend this course for anyone wanting to learn about form validation using JQuerry, Ajax, and PHP.
Thanks Usman.
Validivar.
results.content_html:

results.content: Very detailed and organized. Even for being three years old, I still found the entire course relevant. I felt that attention to CSS at the end was good too.  This course gives you the tools to build a robust but safe form to register data in a database with the modern conveniences of using ajax and jquery to show responsiveness that customers have come to expect. As a business owner wanting to take more control over my online platform, this course has been beneficial to me.

results.content: WOW! Truly a great course. Highly recommended for anyone wanting to learn form validation, jquery and PHP. It's hard to find courses where you're actually shown how everything is done and where on a website dooes it belong. This class explains everything from beginning to end. Believe me when you finish this class you will have learned how to design, develop and validate a form. Great job man!

Believe me when you finish this class you will have learned how to design, develop and validate a form. Great job man!
